title: targeting your own minions
body:
Haven't been playing long but pretty sure this ability isn't in the game? Seems like a cool idea, lots of possibilities with it. Not sure how it would work.. Maybe an ability you activate which gives you a five second window allowing for friendly minion targeting.

Would this be worthless or could it be useful?

replies.body: What is this, dota? Iirc, denying farm like that is something Riot has said they don't want to implement.
well the champion would have concessions regarding combat stats with such an ability.
I just don't think it's something they want to ever see in the game. Riot even changed lulu's shield so she couldn't use it on minions to deny the enemy farm.
That would let Yasuo do whatever he wants for 5 seconds and skip around the entire battlefield
it would be a new champion...?

Would it be worthless? 

No, this would be good for being able to deny farm from your enemy. 

Is it something that I see Riot implementing?

Eh, .. It definitely isn't off of the table, but I don't see it internally being one of their most popular concepts.

Who do you think you are? GP when he was able to Q friendly minions way back when?


Would be funny to see again.
